anya-e0806n5:16_2: Tattha nāmakammaṁ’ ḍittho ḍavitthoti nāmena piṇḍassa sambandhā.

anya-e0806n5:16_6: Dabbakammaṁ daṇḍīvisāṇīti daṇḍādinā dabbena piṇḍassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n5:16_7: Evaṁ kammassa pañcappakārasambhavepicchāyamatthe īyassa vidhānato icchāsambandhiyeva kammaṁ gayhatīti

anya-e0806n5:18_5: Yadi attano puttamicchatīti vattumicchāyaṁ sāpekkhettepi siyā,
anya-e0806n5:19_2: Uppajjamānena īyeneva attatthassābhihitattā attasaddassāppayogoti cetampi na saṅgatanti paṭipādayamāha ‘na ca sakkā’tiādi.

anya-e0806n5:19_10: Natu bhinnatthassāti byatirekaṁ dassetvā taṁ diṭṭhantena sādhetumāha-
anya-e0806n5:19_14: Devadattassa dhuruno kulanti sāmyantarabyavacchedāya devadattasaddasso pādānato gurukulanti vuttipadena devadattatthassānto bhāvoti attho.
anya-e0806n5:19_17: Athāttano puttamicchatītyetasmiṁ vākye padassānvākhyānato attasaddassāpphayogo kinna siyāti dassetumāha-

anya-e0806n5:21_0: Nanu ca sutte kammāti vuttattā kammasamudāyatopīyo siyā tyāsaṅkiyeva (mabhā)vaṁ sādhayamāha-
anya-e0806n5:21_2: Vattuṁ iṭṭhā ekasakhyā yassa kammasāmaññassa taṁ tathāvuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:21_5: Kimpanāvayavato na siyā’ mahantamputtamicchatī’ccatra puttamiccatoccāsaṅkiyāha ‘avayavatopi sāpekkhattāyevā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:21_7: Evañcarahi idampi na sijjhatīti codento āha ‘carahi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:21_8: Mahā cāyaṁ puttoceti mahāputtamicchatīti yadevaṁ karīyati tadāyampayogoti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n5:23_4: tassa sādhamyā samāna rūpatāya yampasiddhassa gavayādino sādhiyassa sādhanaṁ tamupamānantyattho.

anya-e0806n5:24_3: Pasiddhena sādhanabhāvenupamānabhūte putte ācaraṇampi pasiddhanti āha-
anya-e0806n5:24_5: Tadācaraṇena tena ācaraṇena puttamāṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṁ vā puttamāṇavaka saddenupacārato gahetvā visayīvasena visayabhāvavohārotipi yujjati.
anya-e0806n5:24_6: Vākyattho panetasmiṁ pakkhe ‘puttamiva puttavisaya māṇavakamiva ācarati māṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṁ karotī’ti,

anya-e0806n5:25_2: taṁ kathamupameyyavacanassa māṇavakasaddassa vuttatthassa payogo yuttoccāsaṅkiyāha-

anya-e0806n5:26_3: Aññathāti yadyupamānopameyyabhāvassa īyeneva jotitattā tadantassupameyye vutti siyātyattho.

anya-e0806n5:32_5: Yeneva karotyādivisiṭṭho abhūtatabbhāvocyattho teneva hetunāti attho.

anya-e0806n5:36_0: Nanu ca asati sutte dutiyāggahaṇe dutiyantehiccāyaṁ viseso kuto labbhate yena ‘saddādīhi dutiyantehī’ti vivaraṇaṁ katanti saccaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:36_1: tathāpi paccayavidhimhi yuttepi pañcamiyā niddese ‘saddādīnī’ti dutiyāyopādānasāmatthiyā tathā vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0806n5:37_5: Yadīpi adhīteccādīsu vattamānakālena kattunā ekavacanena ca niddeso,
anya-e0806n5:37_6: tathāpi tesamappadhānattā aññasmimpi bhūtādike kāle kammādo sādhane bahuvacanena ca paccayo siyā eveti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n5:38_3: tato ca saddādīhi dhātvatthe ippaccayena na bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:38_8: tena bhinnavākyabhāvenāyassa ippaccayassa ca samuccayatoti attho.
anya-e0806n5:38_13: saddādīni karoticcasmiṁ atthe āyo bhavatī’ti paccekamākhyātāpekkhāya vākyaparisamattiyā bhinnatā,
anya-e0806n5:38_25: māḍharāya vatthayugalaṁ dīyatū’ti māḍharo brāhmaṇabhāvena bhojīyate vatthayugalañca labhate,
anya-e0806n5:38_26: tenojukaṁ vuttena vatthayugaladānena sāmaññavuttaṁ bhojanaṁ na bādhīyate,
anya-e0806n5:38_27: tathehāpi ujukaṁ vihitenāyena sāmaññavihito ippaccayo na bādhīyate lakkhiyānurodhena satthakārassa vākya bhedābhedoti nānavaṭṭhitidosoti maññate.
anya-e0806n5:39_0: Yappaccayo na vihito pāṇinīādīhi viyāti adhippāyo.

anya-e0806n5:57_1: Parasamaññābhi paresaṁ kaccāyanā naṁ parokkhāicceva nāmaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:57_3: Aparokkhesūti ettha parasamaññāvasena parokkhāiccanena saha samāsaṁ dassetvā idāni aññathāpi paṭipādetuṁ ‘athavā’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n5:57_5: Parokkhevihitā paccayāti iminā upacārena taddhitappaccayavasena vā parokkhāti saddanipphattimāha.

anya-e0806n5:60_0: Pāṇiniyehettha “bhindati kusūlaṁ’tyādo yā bhedanādikiriyā kammani dissate,
anya-e0806n5:60_1: sā yadā sukarattamattena sappadhānattavacanicchāyaṁ kattuttepyupalabbhati ‘bhijjate kusulo sayameve’ccādinā,

anya-e0806n5:61_1: Atthatoti ‘kammeyeva kyo’ti (na sakkhi) tasmā vuttanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:61_2: Tathāhi ‘bhijjateti savanā kammatāvagamyate’ti iminā atthato kammeyevakyotipaṭipāditameva.
anya-e0806n5:61_5: Aññathāti yadi kammeyeva tepaccayo na siyā.
anya-e0806n5:61_9: Kiṁ vacanenāti pāṇinīyānamiva kiṁ suttattarenāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:62_0: Vacanābhāvepi kammakattari padasaṅkhārakkamopadassanamukhena vutti ganthaṁ vivaritumāha-
anya-e0806n5:62_2: Vākyato uddharitvā padesaṅkhariyamāneti ‘bhijjate kusūlo sayameve’ti vākyato visuṁ katvā bhijjate’ti pade saṅkhariyamāne nipphādīyamāneti attho.

anya-e0806n5:63_10: kathantaṁ visesitesu mānādīsu paresu kyādayo siyuntīminā sāmatthiyena ( ) (sati) bhāvakammesu kattari
anya-e0806n5:63_12: 1) suttehi yathālābhaṁ bhāvādīsu paccayā hontīti viññāyatīti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n5:64_0: Natadatthaṁ vacanamāraddhanti bhāvakammesu kattari mānantatyādividhānatthaṁ pāṇiniyehi viya suttantaraṁ nāraddhanti attho.
anya-e0806n5:64_1: Atha bhāvakammesu kattari ca mānādividhānatthaṁ vacanaṁ nāraddhaṁ dhātuniyamanaṁ dhātuniyamatthaṁ tvassa
anya-e0806n5:64_4: Akammakā dhātuto bhāve kattari ca sakammakā kamme kattari ceti kiriyatthaniyamo yathāvuttena sāmatthiyā labbhateti sambandho.

anya-e0806n5:173_4: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti “yathāvuttakaṭādīnaṁ vattamānattā tabbisayā kiriyāpi vattamānā evāti taṁdvārena kriyatthavisesana”nti.

anya-e0806n5:181_1: Katipayadhātvādipariggahenāti dhātavo pakatibhūtā ādī yeyaṁ kālādīnaṁ te dhā tvādayo tesaṁ pariggahenāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:181_3: kārakaṁ kattādi pakaṁsena niyamena paccayo karīyate etasmāti pakati.

anya-e0806n5:184_5: evaṁ sati napuṁsakena vivaraṇaṁ kathaṁ yujjatīti āha-
anya-e0806n5:184_7: atha jāgareccādo puthagavayavekassarassa jāgarasaddassa ca paccekaṁ kasmā na dvibhāvoccāha-
anya-e0806n5:185_1: Avayavekassarassāti visesanasamāso ‘avayavo ca so ekassaro ce’ti.
anya-e0806n5:187_0: Nanu ca pacatimhi yenevākārena pacasaddo ekassaro teneva tadavayavāpi acsaddo pasaddo ca ekassaro,
anya-e0806n5:187_3: evañca samudāyassa tadavayavānañcekassarānaṁ visuṁ dvibbacane kate aniṭṭhampappotītīdamapākattumāha-
anya-e0806n5:187_5: Sakiṁ satthappavattiyā ekavāraṁ dvibbacanasuttassa pavattiyā dvibbacanakaraṇenāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0806n5:188_0: Sāvayavassāti yathāvuttāvayavehi saha vattamānassa na vinā tehi.
anya-e0806n5:188_1: Evaṁ maññate “yassa dvibbacane karīyamāne sabbesamavayavānaṁ gahaṇaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n5:188_3: tesañhi dvibbacane ekāya dvibbacanassuppattiyā na sabbesaṁ gahaṇaṁ kataṁ hoti nāvayavantassa samudāyassa
anya-e0806n5:188_4: ca katanti puna tesaṁ dvibbacanāya satthappavattiyā bhavitabba”nti.
anya-e0806n5:188_7: Iha ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ dvippayogo dvibbacananti dve pakkhā.
anya-e0806n5:188_8: Tatra ṭhāne dvibbacanapakkhe dosadassanato dvippayogo dvibbacanantyayameva pakkhobbhupagatoti dassento
anya-e0806n5:189_1: tattha uccāraṇe saṅkhyeyye ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ na sambhavati…
anya-e0806n5:189_7: Tathā sati nivuttidhamme ṭhānī bhavatīti ṭhānino nivuttiyā bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:189_10: Tena ppaccaye pare pakatiyā vidhīyamānaṁ kāriyaṁ na siyā,
anya-e0806n5:189_19: Dvippayoge tu dvibbacane nāyaṁ doso samāvisatīti āha-
anya-e0806n5:189_21: Dvidhā bhūtassā tidhinā dhātusseva dvidhābhūtattaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0806n5:191_1: Yadi hyatrāpi chaṭṭhī abhimatā siyā tadā “kha cha sa parokkhānamekassarodidve”ti ekameva yogaṁ kareyya.
anya-e0806n5:191_3: nāññatoti parokkhāvacanasannidhānā casaddena dhātuvihitappaccayāva gayhantīti āha-
anya-e0806n5:191_5: Yadi pana bhusattho ābhikkhaññattho vā vattumiṭṭho siyā,
anya-e0806n5:191_6: tadā bhūsatthādīsu ca daddallaticcādikaṁ hotīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:191_7: Caṅkamati momūhacittānīti bhusatthassa yujjamānattā tyādayo bhusatthe bhavanti bahulādhikārāti vattuṁ sakkāti.

anya-e0806n5:252_0: Dassātyananuvattamānepi dasseva pappoti vacanabalenāti dassetuṁ pakkhantaramāha-
anya-e0806n5:252_2: Anaghaṇsu paresu āparīhi dassāniyamena ḷoccāsaṅkiya nevaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:254_0: Vuttiyaṁ etasmiṁ visayeti ettha etasminti tyādintavajjitapaccaya visayeti attho.
anya-e0806n5:254_2: Na ñāpakatoti iminā idaṁ dasseti “kiñci vacanānusārato viññāyamānatāmattena ñāpīyate kiñci ñāpakena,
anya-e0806n5:254_3: asmimpakkhe vuttānusārato katthaci kassaci dhātuno appayogo viññāpīyatī”ti.
anya-e0806n5:254_7: Asassāppayogoti asadhātussa kismiñci tabbādike paccaye pare bhavitabbantiādīnamappayogoti attho.

anya-e0806n5:255_2: bhūādesasuttantaranti katthaci kassaci appayogassa ñāpakattampissa yujjati aññattha karīyamānamihāpi
anya-e0806n5:257_0: Avabodhe etissa ṇisesu ca īādīsu ca,
anya-e0806n5:257_1: ajjhene etissa parokkhāsu ca ṇisesu ca īādīsucāti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:261_0: Pubbasaralope rūpassa samānattā antinā antu ca gahitoti ‘santi santū’ti udāharaṇadvayaṁ dassitaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:263_1: Anvayabyatirekehi kiriyā yadipi dhātunāva vuccatīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:263_4: So visesoti yena visesena visiṭṭhā kiriyā dhātunāva vuccati so viseso.
anya-e0806n5:263_5: Vācaka bhedatoti sāmaññāya ca kiriyāya visiṭṭhāya ca vācakānaṁ dhātūnaṁ bhedato tenāpīti kaccānenāpi.
anya-e0806n5:265_0: Kiṭṭhamadatīti kiṭṭhādo, kiṭṭhasaddenupacārato kasitaṭṭhāne uṭṭhita sassaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0806n5:269_0: Anusāsīyitthāti anusiṭṭho kamme kto “sā sassa sisvā” (5-117) sāsanāya sāsituṁ.

anya-e0806n5:277_4: tena adīyi aḍīyi alīyi alūyītime saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0806n5:283_0: Atarī, ajīrīti kamena viggaho. Cīyitthāti ciṇṇo, cinīti ciṇṇavā.
anya-e0806n5:285_0: Asakkhīti satto sattavā. ‘Saja=saṅge’tī massāpi satto sattavāti hoti.
